title: A Complaint About The Reroll System
body:
So I just played a ARAM match and I got Gangplank which I then got offered a trade for Cassitopia (I think that's how you spell it) and I can't play her so after I accpeted the trade, I rerolled her (after I tried to get some trades which were declined) into a Cassitopia so I rerolled again and I got Cassitopia again and I'm more then a little salty about this. If I don't want to play that champ, that means when I reroll, I want a different champ, not the same champ so for me to get Cassitopia 2 times in a row is just madding. 

I know Riot is less then likely to respond to this (or fix it) but I think it's worth pointing out this, glitch or not, I think we need some counter measures to stop people rerolling into the same champ even once with their two rerolls. What do you guys think about this?

replies.body: Haha wow thats just stupid, why would they not add in that you can't get the same champion.
